reviews_data.review_text: Such a cute place and yummy desserts! The team even helped our wedding cake flavor dreams come true!
What a fabulous little spot!! Thank you, Yanel (sp?) for welcoming us all the way from Rhode Island! Everything looked amazing and the biscuit cinnamon roll was incredible! Cheers!

Everything here is so delicious - its out of this world. My personal favorites are the cinnamon buns and smores brownies, but you can't go wrong with any of the options. I always love coming in for a treat and a chance to check out a book from the Batch House library! 10/10 all around.

Honestly I picked this bakery to purchase my mom's birthday cake because I fell in love with the story on the website. Seeing the reviews was an added bonus,  but the proof was in the process. I emailed about this special order, and answered a few questions about flavor, colors and style. Picking up our gorgeous cake was a breeze, it was ready on time and they allowed me to look at it and gave instructions on storing it until it was time to present and cut. My mom was surprised and enjoyed the 9" vintage cake. Everyone enjoyed the cake.
Super creative, delicious treats!

The Batchmaker truly outdid themselves with the graduation cake they made for my sister! From the moment we saw it, we were in awe of the attention to detail and craftsmanship. Not only was it beautifully designed, but every bite was pure perfection--moist, flavorful, and made with love. It was the centerpiece of our celebration, and my sister was overjoyed! Thank you for making such a special occasion even sweeter. I highly recommend The Batchmaker for anyone looking for a cake that tastes just as incredible as it looks!

Beyond all of the delicious treats they have each week, I ordered a Gender Reveal cake last year and it was perfect! Everyone loved it and Cris communicated with us directly about what we wanted and needed! Knew I could trust one of my favorite bakeries with something so important!

Wish I had a photo from before we cut but we couldn't wait to dig in

The Batch House is my favorite small business in Charlotte. Not only do they make amazing desserts, the owner and workers there are so sweet, caring and passionate about the community and supporting small businesses. I've tried a lot of the different desserts they offer including their cakes and everything I've had has been incredible. I even had the batch house cater a work celebration where they made 400 brownies/bars and they were able to work with us to even have them delivered. I can't recommend this business enough - not only for their delicious desserts, but for their passion for the city of Charlotte
The Batch House has an amazing selection of goodies! Will definitely be going back. The workers are so sweet and the vibe is adorable!
Its a Kool spot and the oreo cheesecake cookies were
Delicious treats and great service

It had been a while since we visited Bathmaker and today we decided to drop in and we're so glad we did. Yanel was absolutely amazing. She was very knowledgeable about the menu and events at Batchmaker. She recommended the Oreo Truffle cookie as one of her favorites and my husband thought  it was so delicious. I chose the Girl Scout cookie and it was okay. The coconut filling was very salty and each bite gave a different element of taste. Yanel's personality was so much better then past experiences here with staff. Being that she has only been with the company since November she has really taken the time to learn the menu and company as a whole. Because of her outstanding service we definitely will start coming back.
Batchmaker you made a great employee hire with her. Please keep her! I can't wait to come back Saturday for the Cinnamon Rolls she raved about.

The cookies I got weren't terrible--but I've had better (pictured: girl scout, cookie butter, and Oreo). The lady serving us had a really crappy attitude and wasn't very nice. It seemed as if they really dreaded being at work.

Outside of service/food, the location is very cute and beautifully decorated. I was hopeful for the reviews, but the cookies tasted too much like flour. Probably wouldn't come back to be honest.
If you're looking for the sweetest, most positive, kind, and altogether lovely experience, you need to visit The Batch House--a place that offers sweetness for both your tummy and your soul.
Amazing!

I had fantastic service here. I mentioned I was bringing these cookies to Chicago for the holidays and she wrapped them up special for transit. The cookies are delicious too! I can't recommend this place enough!!

I am a long time sweet treat lover. I have the biggest sweet tooth of anyone in existence but I kid you not this place is the best bakery I have ever been in. I tried them for the first time today and everything I tried almost brought tears to my eyes. The people in there rock and I think one bite of their brownies could lift me out of a literal coma. I love u batchmaker. Everyone should support small businesses and especially this one.

We opted out of doing a cake for our wedding as I said I wanted cookies and desserts from my very favorite bakery in CLT, the batch house. The desserts some how became a focal point of the wedding reception. Oatmeal cream pies acting as accessories as people danced the night away. Oreo truffle cookies through out the room! People were DELIGHTED by the desserts, raved about the oatmeal cream pie, s'mores brownies and cookies all night and have reminded me frequently since that day how much they loved the desserts. On top of the taste, the professionalism and kindness at the batch house is unmatched and a local business I beam with pride to support. High recommend batch house for your wedding dessert (and honestly daily sweet tooth) needs!

the absolute BEST bakery! truly the yummiest treats and cris, the owner, and her team are just as sweet as their amazing baked goods! their oatmeal cream pies, puddle cookies, and s'mores brownies never miss and they have a rotating daily selection of treats that are as creative and unique as they are delicious. can't recommend enough!
I wish they have more or unsweet options too.
Stop whatever you are doing and order anything and everything for anyone you love. These are the most delicious cookies and brownies I have ever had.

Every little treat and cookie I've had from The Batch House has been exquisite. The mini churro cake we ordered for a special occasion was no exception! We definitely will be ordering another cake in the future. Also Cristina is wonderful and so kind. Not pictured are the chocolate bourbon pecan pie and pumpkin cheesecake I took over state lines for Thanksgiving that my family demolished! Hot tip: don't sleep on any of the banana bread varieties.

I purchased a pie from the Batchmaker for Thanksgiving and it was hands down the best pie I have EVER eaten. The chocolate bourbon pecan pie was so incredibly delicious.  I'm trying to invent some new holidays so that I have more reasons to purchase even more pies from Cris and her team!

I used the Batchmaker for my wedding desserts and I am so glad I did. Obviously, the mini oatmeal cream pies were to die for and the cookie assortment was such a crowd pleaser! So thankful for the work they do here. Highly recommend!
We recently used The Batchmaker for our dessert table at our wedding and it was a hit! Everyone loved the treats. The team was also very communicative and helpful as well.

I can't say enough good things about The Batch House.  I have been enjoying these treats since her pop-up only days and I will continue to go back.  OCP and Oreo Truffle are my favorites.  I also got my birthday cake from here and HIGHLY recommend getting a cake from here.
Also, it is very cute inside and the customer service is great.

My favorite place to get cakes for any occasion!  I've yet to try a flavor that doesn't blow me away.  My favorite is the s'mores brownie cake, but I'm working my way through the list and also love PB cup, Oreo, and caramel chocolate.  You really can't go wrong.

Hands down the BEST bakery in Charlotte. Each treat is so inventive and fun and you can tell the bakers LOVE what they make and have so much fun creating. Also: one of the best chocolate chip cookies you will ever have is at this bakery. Incredible. 10/10
Ordered three cakes for my son's 1st birthday party - and they were the highlight of the party! So, so delicious!! Definitely a must stop if you're in need of a sweet treat or ordering for an event!

the reses cup style cake her is soo good that I often wish I had multiple birthdays a year.

Such a warm and inviting space filled with magical delicious things

The Batchmaker is our absolutely FAV bakery. It's a must stop whenever we are anywhere near Charlotte. We've considered making the trip to CLT alone just to get our hands on some of Cris' treats. Our faves include OCPs of course, coffee cake, poptarts, PB + chocolate puddle cookies, cookie butter banana bread and s'mores brownies. Honestly you can't go wrong. Can't wait for our next trip. Seriously don't skip out - you won't be disappointed!

Arguably, the Best baked treats in Charlotte. The coffee cakes always hit. The pop-tarts are something else. I also struggle to leave without getting a cake slice.

110% worth the quick trip over to the West Side. Get an oatmeal cream pie or puddle cookie and sit outside in the courtyard. You won't be disappointed.

Friends from out of town always ask us to pick up treats from here when we come visit.

We worked with Cris and the Batch House to cater desserts for our wedding. Everything went perfectly and the desserts were a massive hit and huge success among our guests. Everyone raved about them. Cris helped us refine our order over the months leading up to our wedding to make sure we had the right quantities. They were also able to easily accommodate our need for some gluten-free options. We ended up ordering a cake, and a variety of mini's (brownies, cookies, and oatmeal cream pies). The cake looked amazing and tasted even better. The mini desserts were many of the guests favorite aspect of our wedding. The desserts here are just delicious, words can't do it justice, you have to go try for yourself! We would highly recommend the Batch House to anyone who appreciates a good dessert. We're so lucky to have found this Charlotte staple!

We ordered 10 Dozen cookies for our welcome party for our wedding and they were INCREDIBLE! So unique and truly the best cookies we have ever had, our guests could not stop talking about them! Highly recommend for any event you have - Thank you Cris and the Batchmaker team for adding a memorable element to our wedding weekend!!

I've been a big fan of the batch house/the batch maker since the day the original location opened. They have the most delicious treats, I'm obsessed with all of the cookies and brownies, but the smores brownie and Oreo truffle cookie have to be my two favorites. The draft latte is also the best coffee beverage I've ever tasted, not exaggerating. Everyone must try this bakery, you will fall in love! Plus Cris, the owner, has the most beautiful and genuine soul, so you can't help but want to support her small business and her team! These pics date 2021-2024!

Unique atmosphere and creative pastries.
I tried the banana dulce de leche bread and for me it was too sweet. Also I ordered an ice latte and they sweetened a lot without asking me. :(
I truly recommend you to visit their restroom, it is amazing the decoration.
Visited with my fiance, she loved it which made her day and made mine too. Like the vibe and the fact they have a lending library.

We absolutely love the batch house! So many different options, from cookies to cakes to pop tarts, and the flavors are always rotating which keeps it super fun and each trip unique. The space is adorable and cozy, and the patio is beautiful and big for the kiddos to play and exert some energy. The staff is so wonderful and the owner cares so deeply about her community - so many wonderful things to love about this place!

I ordered some items for my fathers birthday party and everyone raved about the desserts.

I ordered the chocolate cake, the strawberry cake, the number cookie cake, lemon squares, oatmeal creme pies and brown butter pumpkin pie.

Everything was great and I recommend it to everyone.

Great bakery! I recently ordered 2 birthday cakes.
Matilda and Red Velvet. Both were amazing and worth the 45 min drive! Can't wait to go back and try some of the items in the bakery case!

Sweetest bakery in all of Charlotte with the best crew. Love their rotating flavors and seasonal goodies. The entire staff is just the absolute best and always so inviting. Must have for all celebrations!
The Batch House has the best baked goods in Charlotte! I cannot stop thinking about their PERFECT cookies. The pop tart and brownie were also great. I cannot wait to taste more very soon!
Best bakery in Charlotte! Whether you need to have a custom dessert made for a special occasion or if you're just looking to pick up a sweet treat, this is the place for you!

Love the place, very cute and cozy. The sweets are a bit on the overly sweet side, but I can cut them in half and have them for two days. That's just me; my kids love it. They devour the cookies  and greatly enjoy the cupcakes .
It's my first experience at this place, but I can see it becoming a go-to treat.
if you have a big sweet tooth then here's your spot! my boyfriend and i got the s'mores and churro brownie and it was so good!
Incredible! Imagine your coolest friend who always has fresh baked goods when you go to her house- that's the vibe of this place. Exceptional desserts and super friendly staff! Can't wait to go back

This is an awesome place right next to Platform Coffee. They make "batches" of a dozen or more baked offerings and generally sell out each day. The s'more brownies are killer!  They also make custom cakes if ordered in advance. It's the kind of place that just makes you happy when you step inside!

My husband & I dropped in while visiting Charlotte from Atlanta. I immediately fell in love when I walked in: the interior is a dream & would be perfect for working, meeting friends, or a photoshoot! The food was so good, too! My husband had the cinnamon roll & I had a strawberry cheesecake cookie that I meant to just have a bite of but couldn't stop eating. I am kind of glad this is not in Atlanta bc I would spend too much time & money there (jk, please open one in Atlanta).

I ordered a birthday cake and two batches of cookies for my daughter's 5th birthday. The guests legitimately said it was the best cake and cookies they've ever had. I have no pictures because it was all eaten way too quickly  One person even told me they are a cake snob and it was one of the best pieces of cake they've had. 10/10 recommend

We chose The Batchmaker for our wedding cake, a stunning vintage heart shaped cake, beautiful to the eye and delicious to the taste. The service and the communication were on excellent. Thank you so much Batchmaker for everything.

Love the Batch House! I just wish dogs were not allowed any side. Visited today and right behind me two ladies came in with two dogs. Had I wanted to sit down and enjoy my cookie, I would've had to opt out.

Where do I start? It was my birthday on July 19th, and I wanted a tres leches cake for it, so I did my research and found this place. (FYI, they require orders for cakes at least one week in advance but can make accommodations if you need it sooner.) Anyways, I ordered it and brought it home. As soon as I sliced into the cake, I already knew it was going to be good.

When I took the first bite, let me tell you, it was single-handedly the best tres leches cake I have ever had in my life. It was rich, creamy, decadent, moist--everything you could want in a tres leches cake. It's the kind of cake you have to lock up in a safe because every bite leaves you craving more. It was sweet but not overly so, striking the perfect balance--at least for me.

I ended up paying $68.58 with taxes included. Some may think this is too much for a cake (like my mom), but at the end of the day, when it comes to cakes, I'd rather pay almost $70 for a high-quality cake and be satisfied than $20 for a low-quality one and be unsatisfied.

P.S. I also got some miscellaneous items like their Oreo cookie, cinnamon coffee cake, and chocolate chip cookie with a chocolate bar in the middle. That cookie was insanely good; it easily ranks as the second best cookie I've ever had in my life--10/10 (I'm not even going to lie, if I had more of the Chocolate chip cookies, I would've eaten them all that night ). The Oreo cookie was a little too sweet for me--7/10, but the cinnamon coffee cake was good too--8/10.

Overall, I highly recommend this place and will definitely be doing business with them in the future.
My favorite place to get goodies. I love trying something new but my favorite will always be the OG chocolate chip puddle cookie
Making classic treats with a unique spin! I'm a sucker for anything s'mores- their s'mores cookie & s'mores brownies were amazing! It's the cutest store with a golden girls theme, which I LOVED!
Fantastic everything! I tried a bunch of stuff and everything was outstanding but in my opinion, the cream pie was the winner!

Tried to visit last Friday but they were closed, so we went back the next day. I was really looking forward to trying their bread, but when I mentioned my cinnamon allergy, they told me all the doughs are mixed with cinnamon. So, I had to pass on that.

Still, I enjoyed the classic and feminine ambiance

Red velvet cake wasn't impressive could've gotten a red velvet from publics that was better tasting and half the price. When I ordered online and they sent me the invoice they added on a ten percent tip automatically without asking about the tip.

I found The Batch House when looking for a cake for my husbands birthday. I couldn't believe this adorable and delicious bakery was 2 miles away from me and I didn't know it. Fast forward 3 months later and The Batch House outdid themselves again for our babies gender reveal cake. I can't wait to celebrate many more milestones with The Batch House creations

Easily my favorite bakery in Charlotte. I've been there many times, despite being located over 40 minutes away. It's always worth the drive! My favorites have been the classic cinnamon roll, millionaire shortbread cookie, s'mores brownie, Creme Brulee Cookie, and the OCP. Hoping to try even more of their menu in the future, and crossing my fingers that someday Cris, the founder, will release a cookbook. I know I'd be first in line to order it

Food is good. Customer service is really bad. The girl working was quite rude and then as soon as I paid she walked away without even a thank you. Then it appeared their card machine didn't get my payment. She didn't even come after me and had another worker come ask me to pay again. She just looked at me like she was annoyed with me when it wasn't even my fault.

This place is amazing! The most scrumptious cinnamon rolls. I tested cinnamon from four of the best bakeries in Charlotte side by side. The Batch House was far and away the best. My whole family voted and then asked for more. On our first visit we got the blueberry pop tart and creme brulee cookie. The cookie tasted just like creme brulee. These pics were from two visits, my boxes and the friend I brought back to this must try bakery!
Seriously the best hands down around Charlotte! You're missing out if you don't.
Cake and cookies were delicious!

A great Bakehouse with good quality ingredients and texture. Unfortunately not my preferred style. Overall too sweet and not enough complexity. I can see why most people like this place. I would still recommend.

Oatmeal Cream Pie: tasty oatmeal cookie with a good filling but there was too much filling so ended up being too sweet. It's like eating a triple   stuffed oreo.

Smores Brownie: tasty marshmallow topping torched a bit. Brownie was decent. The Graham cookie crust really hit the spot.
I love love love love the desserts here. So delicious
Where is the phone number?!?
The best custom cakes and yummy treats!
A must visit bakery if you're a local or visiting the city. Definitely try oatmeal cream pie which is their best seller and s'mores brownies. Great job with the reopening.

I've been going here for several years! From my own wedding cakes, to birthday cakes, and the most flavorful cookies in town. I love the batchmaker as a bakery and the heart of the owner. 10 out of 10 recommend

Amazing and life changing sweets. The vibe is immaculate and the owners are treasures to the city. I ordered a cake with only 48 hours notice and they were able to accommodate the rush and make it look so pretty. Definitely order your cakes ahead of time, but I truly appreciate their flexibility and consideration with my order.

Batch House made all the desserts for the "Dessert Bar" at our daughter's wedding recently!  Who knew you could have a family argument over what was better--the S'mores Chocolate cake or the Oatmeal creme pies!  Truly, the deserts were beautiful and SO tasty!  Highly recommend Cristina, the Batchmaker;  whether it's just to stop in for a "sugar fix" or if you need catering for a special event!
We had the brownie cookie dough cake for my sons 11th  birthday. It was a hit! He said it's the best cake in the world!

First and foremost my family and I want to thank the lovely associate (sorry I don't know your name) for finding my wallet and her willingness to stay 35 minutes extra after closure to make sure I got it back. Her customer service was very welcoming and friendly from get go but her act of kindness sealed the deal. It was my wife's birthday and I had her day all planned out and losing my wallet would have ruined it completely! Thank the Lord Jesus Christ for answering prayer and using that sweet young lady. Now to the food, it was absolutely exceptional. Hands down the best bakery in the Charlotte metro area. My family got Oreo truffle cookie, chocolate pudding cookie, pumpkin s'mores, and the oatmeal cream pie (Some names maybe wrong) Each had its own unique favorite but all were so moist and delicious. My favorite was the pumpkin s'mores but would highly recommend them all. We'll definitely be back to support The Batch House and would like to say a special thank you to the young lady again for saving the day!

Ordered mini oatmeal cream pies for a wedding.  Cristina was wonderful to work with and everything was ready when we arrived.  Our guests LOVED them!  Do yourself a favor and go get you some of her sweet treats!

This is the ULTIMATE bakery!! Truly the best I've ever been to. I am a major foodie (and food blogger) and dream about this bakery 24/7. I was recently back in the Charlotte area and brought 2 boxes home with me It's that outstanding!!!!

I go here usually once a month or every other month and I have not once been disappointed. To this day I have not found a better tasting cookie/brownie/lemon bar. I make it a point to try other bakery's when we go out of town and nothing has ever come close. Thankfully for my health and for my bank account,it's fairly far from my house or I would be here every week to get a box of goodies.

Cris (the owner) is simply the BEST! She is truly one of the kindest women ever who loves everyone. The treats here are 10/10 always. There's always a great selection and they are so delicious! It is my absolutely favorite bakery. The atmosphere is so welcoming too!
The Batch House makes the most delicious treats. S'mores brownie is a must. And more importantly the owners are incredibly kind humans.

In my opinion this is THE BEST bakery in CLT.Honestly....the best bakery I've EVER been to. It's absolutely adorable first of all, the staff is always so friendly and patient. The desserts are just so delicious and creative and I love how she changes up the menu ,adds fun seasonal desserts. I would strongly encourage to follow them on social media to see all events and stuff they have! Anyways I love this place, I rave about it to anyone who will listen, especially my clients (we love talking about food lol)! And I will for sure be checking out some of the goodies they will have this Friday for hispanic heritage month!

I'm not a huge review person but this place is AWESOME!! I went on a Thursday & got a smores brownie and a puddle cookie & then had to go back the next day on Friday to get them again so I could share with my friends & family and tried a couple of other things that day too. I can't recommend it enough!

Absolutely loved the cake I ordered, we got the triple threat cake and it was not only lovely to look at but it was an awesome size and tasted delicious! Would love to come back and try more of their yummy looking sweets!
I needed A LOT of cookies on a time crunch for my wedding, and they exceeded my expectations! I couldn't be happier with everything they did, and the cookies were delicious!
Thank you for making my son's birthday treats! Highly recommended.

February 2023: I had the most AMAZING tres leches cake from The Batchmaker. I could tell it was made with love. Thank you! 

August 2023: ! I *obviously* needed Cris' help with my daughter's birthday cookie cake request. It blew all of my expectations out of the water. You are amazing!!!!

Got here before 11:40 on a Saturday with my family on our way to the airport. We knew they closed at noon. After we ordered I went straight to the restroom,  and when I can back out my family had gone outside. It was quite hot and sunny. My husband said they would have waited for me inside but the people working made sure he overheard their conversation (Something like, "Good thing we move cleaned everything since we're closing.") So he felt unwelcomed. Which is not cool. We didn't really have time but we snacked for 5 minutes outside on the brownies and it was only 11:50 by the time we were on our way. It was our first time here and will probably not come back since we can have better brownies elsewhere and they could have been friendlier.

The theme inside is golden girls, 90s pink. Really unique decor and desert offerings are nice. We came 1.5 hrs before close and they had a nice selection still. The s'mores brownie and oatmeal creme pie were very tasty.

The Batch House is by far the best bakery in Charlotte! Cris and her team are always coming up with fun and creative baked goods. The cereal inspired cookie I had today was out of this world! Her team always greets you with a smile and the bakery itself is so cute and welcoming. Definitely get an oatmeal cream pie and a s'mores brownie!

Always great. The cookies are amazing,the brownies too. Pre ordered a blueberry pie can't wait to try it! Staff is always pleasant efficient and friendly. They emit "thank you for being a friend" vibes.

We've ordered from The Batch House on numerous occasions, so when we got engaged, the obvious choice was to order our cakes from them for our wedding! Scorned by many a sad, dry grocery sheet cake, people seem to have a thing against cake, which makes me sad. I knew if our guests had The Batch House's cake, their minds would change. Though The Batch House doesn't do conventional wedding cakes, we elected to order five different cakes -- and transport them across the state line (yes, they're really that good). All flavorful, fun, and moist, they were quickly devoured by our guests, many of whom made it their personal quest to try every flavor. The caterer had to wash extra cake plates mid-way through the reception because they had run out! Cris was such a delight to work with and the whole Batch House crew made our day that much more special.

Back when it was in the old location or now in the new location off Berryhill, The Batch Maker remains my favorite bakery in Charlotte, hands down. It's my go-to place for the best baked treats. The chocolate puddle cookies are delicious, but everything is ridiculously good.

the kindest owners, the best baked goods! 10/10! love how they made the experience so personal and even welcomed us to the area as we are new. Their food is incredible but the hospitality is like no other.

The Batch House was really a cool little bakery with laid back vibe.  It would be great to go relax and have coffee and some pastries or even have a photoshoot.   However, the cookies were average.  We ordered a few of the speciality cookies and they really didn't have much flavor.  They were all decent but not better than some of the other local shops.

The thing that Batch House has on some of the other places is location.  Besides having a really unique and relaxed interior space, the outdoors is a shared space with lots of chairs, tables, fire pits, etc.  It's just a cool place to hangout.  It's a least worth visiting and hanging out for a bit.
Delicious food, charming atmosphere.
Best bakery in CLT, love the unique twist on classics and homemade touch.
Love this place, it doesn't matter if I'm coming in person getting a s'mores brownie or a custom cake. They are always sweet and kind to me

It could have just been an off day today. I still highly recommend this place... but today we spent $16 on a creamsicle cookie, peach pop tart and a slice of carrot cake.

Creamsicle Cookie was definitely a buttery sugar cookie base but nothing else. No orange flavoring at all and not worth the butter calories to keep eating it. Disappointed.

Peach pop tart. Mainly icing and pastry dough. We only got a few bites of a peach spread in the very center. Would be better with thinner pastry and more filling.

Carrot cake. Good.

A 5 star Google review doesn't do this place enough justice for just how incredible it is! From the extremely kind staff to the tastiest treats in Charlotte, you will not be disappointed checking this place out. Any bakery willing to sell cookies the size of my entire hand has a special place in my heart (not to mention their brownies are nothing short of perfect).

If you have a sweet tooth like my wife says I do, check out the Batch House!!
Everything here is absolutely amazing.

One of the best bakeries I've been to! Just stepping inside the pink doors puts a smile on my face. Add in how delicious and creative the treats are and you really can't beat The Batchmaker. I know I keep coming back

I cannot believe I have not posted a review sooner. I've been a fan of Cris from the days of BH No. 1! Everything we have tried from there has been beyond delicious! Her cookies are like none other - those puddles are MAGIC! They made our wedding cake (we got a mini) and it was amazing - chocolate and PB - to die for. It was so good we ordered it for our first anniversary again and it was just as wonderful! My hubby loves the OCPs and even more the rum raisin oatmeal cookies. We live over an hour away now, but can't wait to visit the new shop again and get some treats to save for a rainy day. Not only is Cris the sweetest human, her whole team is AWESOME! You won't be disappointed when you visit.
Lovely place. We had some great treats and the service was welcoming and friendly

Amazing place full of delicious looking treats and cakes. I bought a birthday cake for the first time here. It was good but unfortunately it was extremely dense and dry. We popped a few slices in the microwave which did the trick. I'll try again in the future but a little disappointed it wasn't moist and fresh tasting.

We love the Batch House! Everything is incredible, the staff is so nice and we find it so hard to not get everything when we're there. All the baked goods are huge too, it'll be hard to get through in a day!
Soooo good. Literally never disappoints.

It is not only about the delicious cake and cookies, it is about who is behind them. I have ordered online from out of state and the owner Cris went above and beyond to get my order ready at short notice and to organize that it would get on it's way. I am so grateful that with her help my special request was attended. Like the slogan  on the website says: people first, cake second. This is so true. Thanks Cris and staff. You are awesome.

They made a mistake with our birthday cake, some miscommunication and it wasn't ready for the pick up time. They literally went out of their way to bake it the day of our event, delivered it to our house as well gave a bunch of free cookies (which were awesome btw). The chocolate buttercream was an amazing addition to our birthday cake. Overall, hugely satisfied and glad we gave them a chance. Ups and downs are part of life so don't feel bad for the mishaps, it's life  hoping to be back very soon!!

I have followed the owner since before she opened this place. Since they opened (and reopened), it has only gotten better. I just wish they stayed open later and/or didn't sell out so early since I am not a morning person.   Today we got there in time to get a cookie butter brownie and a smore brownie. Wow, what a treat, and just as good as I remember- great tasting! We will be back!!! I highly highly highly recommend trying the Batch House.
Decadent

Couldn't wait for the photo to already eat half this cookie. Chocolate, shortbread crumble, and caramel drizzle was outstanding. Staff, incredible, service, outstanding, treats, to die for. Check out the batch maker as soon as possible, you will not regret it.
Amazing oatmeal creme pie cookies!
Sweet place and I love Golden Girls! Yummy Iced coffee!

All the stars for the Batchhouse!! Every single treat Cris makes is out of this world delicious! I'm a baker myself so I don't often purchase baked goods, however I've ordered my own bday cake from her as well as for my nieces! This is the place I take people who come In from out of town and it's also the place I visit on an almost weekly basis.  I can't put into words how incredible this shop is, how loved Cris is and how happy it makes me and so many!! Go there asap & get a s'mores brownie, oatmeal creme pie or a piece of coffee cake! You can thank me later.
Oommmggosh!! Cookie butter banana bread   beyond amazing. She even gave me 2 slices because the one slice was too small! I can't wait to try more!

On the off chance there are items left here, all the desserts are incredible!  Most recently, I got the cosmic brownie.  I would certainly get it again.

I am giving 2 stars to this review because of the borderline egregious health violation I witnessed. I asked for the lava cake dessert and the worker started boxing up the display model that was sitting on the open counter (not behind glass) for everyone to hover over, sniff, touch, look at etc.  When I requested one from the back, the worker said there were no more and didn't see anything wrong with giving the unsanitary display item.  If this is the general attitude toward sanitation and health at this restaurant, I'd be concerned about what goes on behind the scenes.

I went to place an order for cake, but you have to order online. So I drove half an hour for nothing. I ordered online and waited for an email. I checked my email everyday but didn't see anything for a week. I checked back through my email and saw an email from Cristina which I assumed was spam cause I didn't know who Cristina was. I asked if they could still make my cake in two days when we needed it picked up, but they couldn't. Poorly run business in my opinion but still four stars because the food is the best. With better management it would be so much better.
Lots of goodies and love the decor as well.
The BEST ALLWAYS

Wasn't in love with the service today (7/13). I could tell the cashier was a little annoyed with me. I politely asked her if she could change out her glove bc I saw her ring up the previous customer and adjust her clothes with the same glove she was about to service me with. I also noticed with the other hand she scratched her head without washing her hands. After changing out her glove, I ordered two slices of coffee cake, a brown sugar pop tart, and the s'mores brownie. I've had the coffee cake before. It was so moist and flavorful the first time I had it. Today, it was good but not great. The pop tart was meh and the brownie was too sweet for my liking and had a very hard bottom that I didn't like. I wanted to like this bakery but I wasn't impressed with it.
Dessert was delicious

Best bakery place I've probably ever been to. Wouldn't hesitate to say that every item here is probably very good, and likely why they sell out so fast. I would highly recommend the oatmeal cream pie, and any of the cookies.

A lovely little bakery with a constantly changing menu each day.  Most items are gone once they sellout so get there quick on the weekends. They sell a variety of cookies, brownies, pastries, and other breakfast baked goods.  Not too much in the way of cakes though.

I don't have any recent pictures because I usually devour everything before I think to but I'm stopping in this week! Batchmaker continues to be a favorite in our house and just the experience of walking through those beautiful pink doors and being greeted like they have been waiting for you all day, and that they're so happy to have you there makes the experience that much sweeter. We are so lucky to have such kind souls and amazing treats here in Charlotte. Keep doing what you're doing everyone, you're crushing it!
Absolutely amazing! Doesn't get any better than The Batchmaker!

I brought my kids in for a treat and was blown away when I took a nibble of the Oatmeal Cream Pie! It was phenomenal! Their Peanut Butter Brownie was also tasty. It was a little dry but full of flavor! I will definitely be back to soak in more of the lovely atmosphere and try other desserts!! Did I mention the Oatmeal Cream Pie?
Saw this on Instagram and said "why not it's five minutes away". Let me tell you what, this was the best bakery I've ever been to. You need to go.

This is the best bakery in Charlotte. My wife, mom & dad, and co-workers are all obsessed with this place. The chocolate puddle cookies, smores brownies, churro cinnamon buns, oatmeal pies, and everything else are amazing. We ordered our first cake last week and it was incredible as well. I look forward to trying more of the flavors. In addition to the all the treats, Cris and her staff are all extremely nice, accommodating, and Cris is very responsive when placing an order. I can't say enough good things about this bakery.

Oh man. Amazing! I ordered a dozen of the dealers choice cookies for Father's Day and they were the best cookies I've ever had! Cristina was great with the ordering process, so kind and helpful. When we went to pick up, the bakery was so so cute. The staff was attentive and very kind. Such a fun place! My son was in heaven checking out all of the treats. And the golden girls themed bathroom was a nice touch. We will absolutely be back and cannot recommend them enough!

The BEST bakery!! I got a snickerdoodle cupcake and Oreo cookie and WOW. Speechless. So good and so fresh. The employees are so kind and warm and friendly which really made my morning.
The establishment itself is absolutely adorable, the best breakfast meetup for a date, friends, family, etc. it is so beautiful inside and has a bunch of great outdoor seating.
Highly recommend coming here!!

A must-visit spot in Charlotte! Everything we've tried is incredible and the owner & team are as kind as it gets. It's hard to pick favorite treats from here but the cinnamon roll was what breakfast dreams are made of.

Cris and her crew are the most wonderful humans and make insanely delicious treats. It's hard not to appreciate when people make an effort to remember you by name (does that mean I go to often? Maybe). Truly a hidden gem that needs to be on everyone's list. Do yourself a favor and get an Oreo truffle cookie.

It was a beautiful, big, delicious cake. I'm picky, and they delivered so well. We got the classic chocolate birthday cake. The communication was great too. Very kind and nice people. We ordered less than a week in advance, and they were happy to accommodate us. Thank you!
Great service and sooo yummy
I ordered  the Birthday Cake for my family gathering and it was a HIT!!! So moist and delicious .  Thank you, Batchmaker! I will definitely be back.
Great food! Check out the restroom while there. Golden Girls theme:)
A. M. A. Z. I. N. G.
Always a stop our whole family enjoys! The selection is diverse, product it top notch, and staff is so sweet!

The Batchmaker is my FAVORITE local spot for sweets. Specifically my must have items are the S'mores brownies and the Oatmeal Cream Pies. I also love the local and small town feel that the bakery provides. The location is cute and quaint. The owner Cris literally treats customers like family and puts so much passion behind what she does. It's also the bakery that I send anyone who visits Charlotte to try.
Butterfinger cookie. That is all.
Catered a company breakfast with muffins and banana bread. Huge hit!

The Batch House is my favorite place to go for desserts and great customer service. Dom was great, informative and friendly. My family and I travel about 55 minutes almost weekly, just to satisfy our sweet tooth. Highly recommend this place. Viva Honduras!
Best super sized oatmeal cookies!
Such a cute place and they have the BEST sweets!
The Brownies were AMAZING!
Loved this place, very beautiful little spot. Friendly staff and some very good pastries!

My favorite is the Smores Brownie with the toasted marshmallow on top. Smores Brownie  
Thanks for the experience!

My boyfriend and I went here and loved it. We went around noon and they didn't have many options left because they get super busy on the weekends. But they still had the things that we wanted to try. We got snickers bars and chocolate chip cookies and we can't wait to go back. The inside looks really cute also. I'll either go during the weekday or get up early to go on the weekends to try other things.

From a taste standpoint, The Batchmaker is outstanding. I have tried their cakes and cookies and both are worth the cost.

From a customer service standpoint, The Batchmaker leaves a lot to be desired. Because they don't have a business contact number readily available online, I have shown up several times either to discover that their business hours were wrong or that they had no baked goods left. This is not ideal when a visit is out of the way. Additionally, I have reached out to them in the past on mediums like Facebook and gotten no response.

I love the smores Brownie, and the coffee cake, and the ....
Whatever,  it's all amazing! Just wait until the outside courtyard is finished! My new hangout ya'll!!!
Cozy atmosphere. Very good bake goods, tried the oatmeal creme pie and the draft latte, both were very good.
Yea they did sum'n fr
The most FABULOUS desserts in an adorable shop - MUST VISIT if you're in Charlotte!
Best baked goods in Charlotte! The owners give back to the community, just an awesome story.

I FINALLY made it here after moving away from Charlotte a year ago. This was worth the wait and I completely get the hype. The chocolate sea salt caramel cookie was the best thing I've ever had. That smores brownie was a very close second. Will be back!

Have you ever bit into something.. and said "WOW"? I got an oatmeal cream pie today. How can something taste so good? Every single bite is a wow moment. Wowwwww.

Everything you could ever want in an oatmeal cream pie. The textures of the cookie, the consistency of the cream is impeccable. It is truly an EXPERIENCE. I hope that who ever reads this, gets to embark on that experience. TRULY EXCEPTIONAL!!!!
Fabulous Fabulous Fabulous

People first cake second! If you're visiting Charlotte this is a must stop! Cris the batch maker is not only an incredible person, her baked goods are top notch. Seriously guys I've never had anything less than amazing at this beautiful pink bakery! Some of my personal favorites are s'mores brownies, Oreo truffle cookie, chocolate puddle cookie, and her cake! So long story short if you want incredible baked goods in a homey cozy space look no further than the bash house in Charlotte.
Not the easiest place to find if you're driving down the road, but it's one of my favorite bakeries in Charlotte!

Cris is so wonderful and the community and bakery she has created is on another level! The bakes are incredible and truly made our thanksgiving. A must try if you are in the Charlotte area - and you'll keep coming back!

I've been to many bakeries in Charlotte but truly none compare to Batchmaker! Her pastries are absolutely unreal delicious. Before going I had heard about the oatmeal cream pies, and didn't think an oatmeal cream pie could be that great...but it's probably one of the best desserts I've ever eaten. Since discovering it, I've gone back many times because I can't stay away!
Absolute perfection. Every. Single. Treat.

I love the BatchMaker!! So glad she is back! The new store is simply adorable! Picked up one of her famous cakes today for my daughter's 13 birthday this weekend and cannot wait to try it. Also, got a couple of her FAMOUS oatmeal creme pies (OCP) ! Everything she touches tastes like heaven!
If you haven't tried their treats, you're missing out!
First time visiting The Batchmaker and it did not disappoint! Delicious food and excellent customer service. Can't wait to come back and try more treats.

We've always loved the Batchmaker bars and cookies; so we asked Cris, the delightful owner to provide the desserts for my daughter's wedding. She worked with us on what we would need based on our guest count. Usually, the desserts at a wedding go unnoticed; however, our dessert table line was out of control. We had 5 cakes of different varieties and one that our florist added flowers to. They looked beautiful. We had over 600 bars and cookies and there was little left over. People raved about everything we had - smore brownies, lemon squares, caramel chocolate chunk, dirty brownies, bananas foster brownies, oatmeal cream pies, brown butter sugar, banana bread cake, chocolate cake, apple cake etc. Cris and the Batchmaker is a must try bakery and I'd highly recommend if you're looking for a fun, delicious dessert option for a large crowd.
The oatmeal cream cookie is yummy
Great variety of cookies and baked goods with different flavors. The "S'mores Brownie" though is a game changer. The place has a nice vintage aesthetic inside. Staff was very welcoming and friendly.
Unbelievably good cookies! The oatmeal cream pie may be the best cookie I've ever had the pleasure of eating.
One of everything, please! I can't wait for Cris and the crew to be back in their new location.

Things you need in your life:

- Oatmeal Creme Pie (OCP)
- S'mores cookie
- Chocolate puddle cookie

You can't go wrong with getting anything from Cris' menu! While I was down in NC I made it a point to make the 140 mile roundtrip to The Batch House. I have zero regrets; and the friend that came with me is grateful to have been included!

Before I moved to Charlotte, I followed @thebatchmaker on Instagram and impatiently waited for the day I could visit  It did not disappoint. The treats you will find here are incomparably delicious -- and made with so much love. You can feel it as soon as you walk through the doors. The Batch House is such a special place full of special people, could not recommend it more!
The brownies are super sweet! The coffee and banana chocolate cake are light and delish!
If you have never tried this bakery, you are missing out. They have amazing desserts and coffee.  The banana bread ,brownies, and cookies aren't like any other!
wow this place! such a lovely shop! The cinnamon poptart, smores brownie, puddle choc chip cookie, incredible!!! Will always make this a pit-stop when I travel through!
Love this place!

Beware of ordering specific items or when you order a dozen or more or a cake.  This bakery is a miss at times.  Cake was very dry. We had to throw it away.  Cookies appeared to be tossed in the box with multiple broken but were tasty.  Some of the items are too sweet.  Staff is not the friendliest and yes I've been multiple times.
Great place!! Best cookies in a the city.
Highly recommend their coffee cake and banana bread - excellent!! My only wish is that they'd accept wholesale orders. Very knowledgeable/friendly staff.
Omg Everything I've tried here is mouthwatering delcious (and I've trieda lot). This is a must go if you have a sweet tooth!

This place was phenomenal. I have been waiting to go here for about a month. The owner and all the people were so kind and friendly. I would have loved to stayed and heard the story of this place but didn't want to keep the guy outside from getting some cookies. The cookies were phenomenal. We got the oatmeal cream, chocolate chip, oreo, and a smores brownie. We decided we definitely had to share these treats so we took them down to my parents to share with them. They loved them.
So tasty!!! The chocolate chip puddle cookies are my fav. Arri ed right when they were closing and they were kind enough to provide service with a smile.
If you want fresh amazing treats, this is hands down the best bakery in Charlotte.

8/19/2020
Heard about this place a few times and decided to give it a try this morning.  It's tucked away off of Freedom Drive but what a little gem of a place!!  I ordered a latte and the strawberry poptart.  Everything looked so good in the display case it was so hard to choose.

The strawberry poptart was calling my name so I answered back and boy what a great decision that was.  It was absolutely delicious!!!!  Pictures never do it justice but I would highly recommend a stop at The Batch House!!!!!  I'll be coming back to try those other yummy looking pastries in the display case!  Thank me later!

We have ordered several cakes from here. I will tell you each one is delicious. We did have some issues with our last order and the greatest thing about Chris is her customer service. She personally responds to each and every email and we emailed back-and-forth a few times and I told her how much my family loves her cakes and it is a tradition in our home to get birthday cakes from her and when I told her how we felt about the last cake she immediately fixed it. Now don't get me wrong the cake was delicious the cookie dough was phenomenal there was just a couple of issues and she fixed it... I love this place I recommend this place to everyone I think Chris and her staff are the absolute best and I wouldn't go anywhere else for my cakes.
The best desserts in Charlotte!
Awesome, cute shop. Great staff and amazing sweet treats. Tres Leche is thebomb.com!
Best oatmeal cream pies in the world! Good coffee too is a plus!!
What a special day with such an amazing cake!
Friendly staff and delicious sweets.

Absolutely love this place! Have been a long time follower of Cris on insta and was so excited when she opened the shop. Everything in the store is amazing quality and delicious. Just ordered a cheesecake for a friends shower and it got so many compliments! You haven't lived until you've had their oatmeal cream pies. Staff is so friendly and I love supporting this local business :) Will be ordering more cakes for upcoming showers/events and getting goodies whenever I can!
The small touches of this family owned business are what puts it over the top. Try their Tres Leche Latte and you won't be disappointed!
Everything is good! Cute atmosphere! The brownie with mint and Oreo is to die for!! A small business definitely worth supporting :)
SUCH YUMMY FOOD!!  The best part is that they also serve chai! The perfect combo

I wish a took a pic of the food but ate it too quick. It's that good. I love finding new spots around Charlotte and someone mentioned this place to me. I got an oatmeal cream pie and a chocolate peanut butter brownie. I started with the cookie, it was amazing. The next day I ate the brownie. Honestly probably the best brownie I've ever had. The brownie was thick, dense, fudgy in the middle with a flakey top and had a great balance of chocolate and peanut butter. The girl working the counter was very friendly and pleasant to talk to. Couldn't be happier. I'll be back for sure.

On a side note, to the person who gave a 3 star review, I think your reasoning for giving a 3 star review is unfair. You're upset because a place is popular and sold out of their product that is made fresh daily. It's your own fault. Don't go online and try to hurt a business because of your poor planning. Having to wait an hour for your treats because a business is popular and has a lot of customers is not a fault of theirs. I hope you're having a better day today than the day you wrote your review and attempted to hurt this fine establishments reputation.
I love this place! S'mores brownies are out of this world. Get there early if you hope to snag one though.
the baked goods are to die for!
SHE KNOWS WHAT SHE'S DOING. I love everything they make here. It's a must do if you ever visit CLT
The baked goods here are to die for.
Its THE BATCHHOUSE what can I say! If you know you know! If you dont you better go!!
One of my favorite places in the city for sweets!
Americano and an Oreo cookie
Such a cute and homey spot.  Friendly service, delicious coffee and treats! Bonus for me: if you are enjoying your treats in the store, they use real plates and cups, not wasting plastic or paper !
Good
Best dessert in town!
This place is utterly amazing.  Literally everything we tried was fantastic.  Best bakery in Charlotte.
Wow. Just wow. The pastries here are incredible. Get here early for the best selection. Be prepared to wait in line for a little bit. But it's absolutely worth it.
A-Mazing!! Loved her goodies before she got the shiny new shop

Went there right when they opened and was excited to see the fresh goods get put into the case. They had a good variety (changed everyday too). I ended up getting the Oreo truffle cookie (amazing-goey and great flavor) peanut butter brownie (delicious, but really rich) pumpkin muffin (a great breakfast) and Carmel apple cookie (tasty).

Come early because they sell out quickly.

Cristina is the best Baker that i know in Charlotte NC.
Her charisma and humble energy  is transmitted to her goodies.
She makes every treat from scratch and fresh daily.
I have order Birthday Cakes and treats from her for a while and I am never  never disappointing, my family always wants more .
Can't wait to try all the menu she has.

These treats have been very popular on Instagram and made me really want to try them!

I finally made it one Saturday to try the cookie I've been dying to have: the caramel apple cookie. I also picked up an oatmeal cream pie since my husband loves them.

These sweets are incredible! I loved the caramel apple cookie. I really wanted more caramel and apple. Surprisingly, I think I liked the oatmeal cream pie even more. I don't know how she makes that cream but it's to die for.

I definitely want to come back to try the poptarts and some of the other tasty treats she's making!
Awesome place... all of their cookie,  cakes, brownies are amazing.  Good job

A really special place. Locally (woman!) owned business, staffed by incredibly kind people, the coffee is wonderful (roasted locally by HEX Coffee), and last but not least, the quality of the baked goods are to die for. The cafe itself is really comfortable, well-lit and cozy to work or hang out in. Highly recommend! Charlotte is lucky to have this gem.
Must go first thing in the morning to get some awesome treats before they are all gone. Very different, unique, but very delicious cookies and cakes. You can tell they are made fresh and very soft.

Wonderful baked goods and lovely decor. Unfortunately, as a family of 3 (including a toddler) we waited in line for more than an hour and got the last two cookies. Everything else sold out. It was quite a disappointment because we wanted to try the scones and cakes. Our advice: arrive right before opening because they sell out fast!
Love this place -- a Charlotte gem. The owner is wonderful and she is a master at her craft. Everything The Batchmaker creates is delicious so go check it out!
Excellent baked goods and great coffee
